title: Content Creator & Story Writer Job at Oriki Group
content:
Oriki is an Agri-beauty farm to skin brand, the first and only personal care manufacturer in Nigeria to operate a fast-growing premium wellness & spa brand in conjunction. We work relentlessly towards our vision of putting Africa on the map in the global skincare & wellness industry, poised to significantly contribute to the personal grooming & wellness market share. ORÍKÌ exists to display that African ingredients and their potent benefits will not just remain local; We stand for international best standards and quality.
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Oriki Group is comprised of a wellness day spa with multiple locations, farm to skin retail products, a wholesale & amenity product line for spas, hotels, and airlines, a training institute, the ORIKI franchise and the UNWIND by ORÍKÌ tech app.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content Creator & Story Writer
Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The driven, innovative, creative and detail-oriented Content Creator & Story Writer is to produce high-quality, captivating contents for the different facet of the ORÍKÌ Group.
	The Content Creator & Story Writer works closely with the social media team to update existing material, generate exciting written ups, catchy contents and identify new ways to reach consumers.
	This position requires the ability to anticipate needs, be creative, think critically and offer solutions to problems with a very high level of professionalism and confidentiality.
	To fit this role, you must have a previous remarkable track record of story writing, managing and creating engaging contents for various social media pages, have great time management skills, good understanding of the social media metrics and be able to act as a team player and without guidance.


Responsibilities
Content Creating:


	Conducting research and interviews to learn more about current trends, developments, exciting contents and perceptions about any subject matter to help contextualize your findings.
	Assisting the creative social media team with constructive feedback on materials created for the brand.
	Create and submit monthly content creating plan for each subsidiary of the brand
	Collaborating with various subsidiaries to cover every exciting news, details or objectives to showcase the brand.
	Research and understand target market audience and develop content strategies for engagement for each subsidiary of the brand
	Creating contents to engage target audience for the different subsidiaries of the brand including reels, videos and graphics
	Monitoring social media pages to ensure every captivating content created and approved is posted by the social media team.
	Submitting monthly content creating reports as required
	Suggesting new content creating ways to promote the brand’s offerings, discounts and to reach consumers.


Story Writing:


	Research on the target audience across the various subsidiaries and create compelling and engaging stories for any subsidiary of the brand as required
	Crafting characters, dialogues and plotlines that resonates with the objectives for the content being created for the various subsidiaries of the brand.
	Collaborating with the social media editors’ team to refine work done for any subsidiary of the brand.
	Using story writing to highlight the unique offerings of each subsidiary of the brand.
	Monitoring trends and happenings in the country, evaluate and create captivating story lines in favor of the target subsidiary of the brand for engagement.
	Other responsibilities as assigned.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications with experience.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: jointheteam@orikigroup.com using the Job Position as the Subject of the email.

title: Business Manager Job at Excel and Grace Consulting
content:
Excel and Grace Consulting is a fast-paced business consulting organization with a track record of delivering exceptional business solutions to small and medium-scale enterprises in Nigeria, Ghana, Germany, Switzerland, Canada, etc. We are certified management consultants with the International Council of Management Consulting Institutes (CMC-Global) with over 18 years of experience. Our team of experts and consultants have authored over 20 books on business management, business structure, business operations, human resources, organizational structure, employee development, money management, and so on.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Manager
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers

About the Role


	We are seeking a results-driven Business Manager to oversee operations at our retail and wholesale outlet located in Steel Village, Port Harcourt.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for driving business growth, managing inventory efficiently, supervising daily operations, and ensuring overall profitability.
	This role is pivotal in streamlining our inventory processes and enhancing operational efficiency. If you thrive in a fast-paced retail environment and have a keen eye for stock control, we’d love to hear from you.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage day-to-day business operations including sales, stock, and staff supervision.
	Implement and maintain accurate inventory management systems.
	Prepare regular financial and inventory reports for senior management.
	Ensure excellent customer service standards are upheld at all times.
	Monitor and analyze sales performance and make strategic decisions to improve turnover.
	Coordinate with suppliers and vendors to ensure consistent stock availability.
	Train and mentor junior staff members on inventory handling and sales strategies.
	Enforce compliance with company policies and retail best practices.


Requirements


	HND / B.Sc Degree in Business Administration, Supply Chain Management, or related field.
	Proven experience in retail or wholesale management (minimum 3 years preferred).
	Strong background in inventory management is essential.
	Excellent leadership, organizational, and communication skills.
	Proficient in inventory software and Microsoft Office Suite.
	Ability to multitask, prioritize, and manage time efficiently.


Salary
N250,000 / Month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a brief cover letter to: eandg.tprecruiters@gmail.com using "Business Manager – Steel Village" as the subject of the mail.

title: Receptionist Job at Blowfish Group
content:
The Blowfish Group - In the heart of Victoria Island, brings you the world in one place. Hospitality and leisure, backed by a truly international team of industry professionals. Global standards and the warmth of Nigerian hospitality perfected over time. With our unique approach to servicing, we offer high-end hospitality and leisure carefully tailored with love to suit our customers’ requirements.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Receptionist

Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Perform all check-in and check-out tasks
	Manage online and phone reservations
	Inform customers about payment methods
	Register guests collecting necessary information (like contact details and exact dates of their stay)
	Respond to clients’ complaints in a timely and professional manner
	Welcome guests upon their arrival and assign rooms
	Provide information about our hotel, available rooms, rates and amenities
	Maintain updated records of bookings and payments Etc.


Requirements and Skills


	Applicant should possess a minimum of OND, HND or BSc. from any of the Nigeria-recognized institutions
	Minimum of 3 years of experience in 4/5star Hotel
	Must have very good knowledge of hotel reservation software like Micros/Opera.
	Must be smart, Confident and good-looking
	Excellent communication and organizational skills.
	Ability to maintain a positive, friendly attitude even under pressure.
	Excellent organizational and multitasking skills
	Professional attitude and appearance.





Remuneration
N100,000 - N150,000 / Month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send CV to: kingsley.orji@theblowfishhotel.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: Head of Engineering Job at Sow Real Estate Limited
content:
Sow Real Estate is a premier Nigerian real estate development company specializing in both luxury and mass housing solutions. Established in 2012 and headquartered in Maitama, Abuja, the company has built a reputation for delivering high-quality residential and commercial properties that combine modern design with affordability.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Head of Engineering

Job Location: Abuja (FCT)

Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	As we scale our operations, we are seeking a seasoned and strategic Head of Engineering to lead our engineering and project execution functions.
	The Head of Engineering will oversee the entire engineering and technical operations of the company.
	This role involves leading a multidisciplinary team of engineers, ensuring projects are delivered on time, within budget, and to the highest quality standards.
	The ideal candidate must have extensive experience in construction engineering, project management, and real estate development.


Key Responsibilities


	Lead and manage the engineering department, including civil, structural, electrical, and mechanical engineers.
	Oversee the planning, design, and execution of all engineering projects.
	Develop and enforce engineering policies, standards, and procedures.
	Evaluate and implement new technologies and innovations in construction methods.
	Ensure all engineering activities comply with local and international building codes, health and safety regulations.
	Manage budgets, project schedules, and resource allocation.
	Conduct site inspections to ensure compliance with designs, safety, and quality standards.
	Collaborate with architects, contractors, and consultants to ensure seamless project execution.
	Provide technical guidance and mentorship to engineering teams.
	Prepare technical reports, risk assessments, and performance metrics for executive leadership.


Qualifications & Requirements


	Master’s Degree in Civil Engineering, Structural Engineering, Building Technology, or a related field (Master’s degree preferred).
	5 - 8 years of engineering experience, with at least 3years in a senior or leadership role within the real estate or construction sector.
	COREN certification is mandatory; other professional certifications (e.g., PMP, MNSE) are also added advantage.
	Proven experience in leading large-scale residential and commercial real estate projects.
	Strong knowledge of construction standards, materials, methodologies, and project lifecycle management.
	Excellent leadership, communication, and organizational skills.
	Proficiency in engineering and project management software (e.g., AutoCAD, Revit, MS Project, Primavera).
	Demonstrated ability to lead cross-functional teams and drive engineering excellence.
	Deep understanding of Nigerian regulatory standards and approval processes for real estate developments.


What We Offer


	Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses
	Health and wellness benefits
	A dynamic and collaborative work environment
	Opportunity to work on innovative and landmark real estate projects
	Career development and continuous learning opportunities.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a cover letter to: osezzbank@gmail.com using "Head of Engineering -SOW Real Estates" as the subject of the mail.

title: Sales Manager Job at Sow Real Estate Limited
content:
Sow Real Estate Nigeria Limited is a real estate company that is focused on delivering affordable housing with quality materials and achieving customer satisfaction.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Manager

Job Location: Lekki Phase 1, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking an experienced and results-driven Sales Manager to lead a dynamic real estate sales team in Lagos.
	The ideal candidate must have a proven track record in property sales, with a strong network of high-net-worth clients and decision-makers capable of investing in premium real estate within the Lagosmarket.


Responsibilities


	Lead, motivate, and manage a team of sales executives to achieve and exceed sales targets.
	Develop and execute strategic plans to drive property sales, with a particular focus on high-end residential and commercial developments.
	Leverage an existing network of qualified clients to generate leads and close high-value deals.
	Provide market insights and customer feedback to guide marketing and business development strategies.
	Coordinate property viewings, client meetings, and contract negotiations.
	Ensure a high level of customer satisfaction throughout the sales process.


Requirements


	Minimum of 3 - 5 years of experience in real estate sales.
	Demonstrated success in selling luxury or high-value properties.
	Extensive client base and strong network of prospective property buyers and investors.
	Proven ability to lead and develop a high-performing sales team.
	Excellent negotiation, communication, and presentation skills.
	Strong understanding of the Lagosreal estate market, pricing trends, and buyer behavior.


Benefits


	Competitive salary and performance-based commissions.
	Availability of team vehicle
	Fuel Allowance
	Opportunities for career growth and continuous professional development.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send a copy of their Resume in PDF to: hrsowreallag@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
